main.name: Erick M
main.description: I write code, design mock-ups and make apps. I am passionate about coding and i love creating things that live on the web. . Well-versed in promoting object-oriented approaches to real-time software development and product marketing. Analytical and detail-oriented with deep knowledge in latest industry trends and advancements
main.bio: I build unique custom apps & websites that convert visitors into customers who help businesses and people grow.when not fingers-down coding , I love listening to music reading comic novels and spending time with family watching football.
main.contactmessage: I'm always working on something, and often too excited about it to stop and update my portfolio. Feel free to reach out and see what I'm up to now. I also have major skills in sales, product marketing, and art design. If you have a project or creative need that I can help with, I am that guy! My specialty is full-stack strategy, design and development. My interests, however, extend beyond the web and I love giving back to the community, helping people with brand promotion, art design and marketing.

education.description: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, uiux, Python, cloudinary

testimonials.text: Great developer, has client's needs at heart and puts them first
I thoroughly enjoyed my time working with him, and came to know Erick as a truly valuable asset to our team.

I want to express my gratitude to Erick for his exceptional hard work on our recent project. His commitment to excellence and tireless effort significantly contributed to the project's success. I highly recommend his services to anyone seeking top-notch results.
